trans-unit.source: A trigger action that stops a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: 停止 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> 的觸發程序動作。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively stop a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>動作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>以互動方式停止<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> 只會影響<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>何時為使用中 (之後<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>啟動)。

trans-unit.source: Stopping a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: 停止分鏡腳本的觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated>事件，但不是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[How to： 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)的範例。

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: 暫停、 繼續、 停止或以互動方式控制分鏡腳本

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要暫停、 繼續或控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>，以互動方式設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>屬性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>物件 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 來控制它參考其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>無法在之後開始時以互動方式控制。

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[How to： 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard" /> 類別的新執行個體。
